title: Studio on a houseboat in a résidentiel area 5' Paris
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


for 1 person , participation in electricity, heating, water, boat parking :+150€.
 studio on a barge located in a residential area, in a beautiful landscape garden.
Perfect for student.
Many stores,bus,metro "Pont de Levallois"(line n°3) at 5' by foot. Paris at 5' by metro.
Kitchen with a fridge,a hotplate,microwave, shower , toilets.
1 double bed
Independant : No shared spaces. Small space outside for a chair and a table
Possibility internet.
many pics available on request.
